methods.label: Direct Instruction
methods.intro: Step-by-step explanation with a definition, key points, an example, and a brief summary.

methods.label: Scaffolding
methods.intro: Breaks ideas into small steps with quick check-for-understanding questions.

methods.label: Socratic
methods.intro: Uses guiding questions to help the learner discover the idea before a short explanation.

methods.label: Worked Example
methods.intro: Shows a fully worked example, then gives a similar practice problem.

methods.label: Analogy First
methods.intro: Starts with an everyday analogy, maps it to the concept, then formalizes it.

methods.label: Philo Method
methods.intro: Explains complex ideas in very simple, child-friendly language.
